lead_paragraph: The sport is enjoying growing popularity and self-confidence thanks to recent developments, but pay gaps and policy differences keep the women’s game from standing completely on its own.

headline.print_headline: Women’s Game Gains in Numbers and Visibility, but Gender Gaps Remain
headline.main: Women’s Cricket Gains in Numbers and Visibility, but Gender Gaps Remain

snippet: The sport is enjoying growing popularity and self-confidence thanks to recent developments, but pay gaps and policy differences keep the women’s game from standing completely on its own....
abstract: Surge in popularity for Big Bash League, Australian women's Twenty20 cricket tournament, reflects both wider gains and remaining obstacles for women in sport globally.
